mn117:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn117:2.1: “ariyam vo, bhikkhave, sammasamadhim desessami saupanisam saparikkharam.
mn117:2.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
mn117:2.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
mn117:3.1: “Katamo ca, bhikkhave, ariyo sammasamadhi saupaniso saparikkharo?
mn117:3.2: Seyyathidam—sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati;
mn117:3.3: ya kho, bhikkhave, imehi sattahangehi cittassa ekaggata parikkhata—
mn117:3.4: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyo sammasamadhi saupaniso itipi, saparikkharo itipi.
mn117:4.3: Micchaditthim ‘micchaditthi’ti pajanati, sammaditthim ‘sammaditthi’ti pajanati—sassa hoti sammaditthi.
mn117:5.2: ‘Natthi dinnam, natthi yittham, natthi hutam, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, natthi ayam loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mata, natthi pita, natthi satta opapatika, natthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata sammapatipanna ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti—
mn117:6.3: atthi, bhikkhave, sammaditthi sasava punnabhagiya upadhivepakka;
mn117:6.4: atthi, bhikkhave, sammaditthi ariya anasava lokuttara magganga.
mn117:7.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, sammaditthi sasava punnabhagiya upadhivepakka?
mn117:7.2: ‘Atthi dinnam, atthi yittham, atthi hutam, atthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, atthi ayam loko, atthi paro loko, atthi mata, atthi pita, atthi satta opapatika, atthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata sammapatipanna ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti—
mn117:7.3: ayam, bhikkhave, sammaditthi sasava punnabhagiya upadhivepakka.
mn117:8.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, sammaditthi ariya anasava lokuttara magganga?
mn117:8.2: Ya kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anasavacittassa ariyamaggasamangino ariyamaggam bhavayato panna pannindriyam pannabalam dhammavicayasambojjhango sammaditthi maggangam—
mn117:8.3: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, sammaditthi ariya anasava lokuttara magganga.
mn117:9.1: So micchaditthiya pahanaya vayamati, sammaditthiya, upasampadaya, svassa hoti sammavayamo.
mn117:9.2: So sato micchaditthim pajahati, sato sammaditthim upasampajja viharati, sassa hoti sammasati.
mn117:9.3: Itiyime tayo dhamma sammaditthim anuparidhavanti anuparivattanti, seyyathidam—sammaditthi, sammavayamo, sammasati.
mn117:10.3: Micchasankappam ‘micchasankappo’ti pajanati, sammasankappam ‘sammasankappo’ti pajanati, sassa hoti sammaditthi.
mn117:12.3: atthi, bhikkhave, sammasankappo sasavo punnabhagiyo upadhivepakko;
mn117:12.4: atthi, bhikkhave, sammasankappo ariyo anasavo lokuttaro maggango.
mn117:13.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammasankappo sasavo punnabhagiyo upadhivepakko?
mn117:14.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammasankappo ariyo anasavo lokuttaro maggango?
mn117:14.2: Yo kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anasavacittassa ariyamaggasamangino ariyamaggam bhavayato takko vitakko sankappo appana byappana cetaso abhiniropana vacisankharo—
mn117:14.3: ayam, bhikkhave, sammasankappo ariyo anasavo lokuttaro maggango.
mn117:15.1: So micchasankappassa pahanaya vayamati, sammasankappassa upasampadaya, svassa hoti sammavayamo.
mn117:15.2: So sato micchasankappam pajahati, sato sammasankappam upasampajja viharati; sassa hoti sammasati.
mn117:15.3: Itiyime tayo dhamma sammasankappam anuparidhavanti anuparivattanti, seyyathidam—sammaditthi, sammavayamo, sammasati.
mn117:16.3: Micchavacam ‘micchavaca’ti pajanati, sammavacam ‘sammavaca’ti pajanati; sassa hoti sammaditthi.
mn117:17.2: Musavado, pisuna vaca, pharusa vaca, samphappalapo—
mn117:18.3: atthi, bhikkhave, sammavaca sasava punnabhagiya upadhivepakka;
mn117:18.4: atthi, bhikkhave, sammavaca ariya anasava lokuttara magganga.
mn117:19.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, sammavaca sasava punnabhagiya upadhivepakka?
mn117:19.2: Musavada veramani, pisunaya vacaya veramani, pharusaya vacaya veramani, samphappalapa veramani—
mn117:19.3: ayam, bhikkhave, sammavaca sasava punnabhagiya upadhivepakka.
mn117:20.1: Katama ca, bhikkhave, sammavaca ariya anasava lokuttara magganga?
mn117:20.2: Ya kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anasavacittassa ariyamaggasamangino ariyamaggam bhavayato catuhi vaciduccaritehi arati virati pativirati veramani—
mn117:20.3: ayam, bhikkhave, sammavaca ariya anasava lokuttara magganga.
mn117:21.1: So micchavacaya pahanaya vayamati, sammavacaya upasampadaya; svassa hoti sammavayamo.
mn117:21.2: So sato micchavacam pajahati, sato sammavacam upasampajja viharati; sassa hoti sammasati.
mn117:21.3: Itiyime tayo dhamma sammavacam anuparidhavanti anuparivattanti, seyyathidam—sammaditthi, sammavayamo, sammasati.
mn117:22.3: Micchakammantam ‘micchakammanto’ti pajanati, sammakammantam ‘sammakammanto’ti pajanati; sassa hoti sammaditthi.
mn117:24.3: atthi, bhikkhave, sammakammanto sasavo punnabhagiyo upadhivepakko;
mn117:24.4: atthi, bhikkhave, sammakammanto ariyo anasavo lokuttaro maggango.
mn117:25.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammakammanto sasavo punnabhagiyo upadhivepakko?
mn117:25.2: Panatipata veramani, adinnadana veramani, kamesumicchacara veramani—
mn117:25.3: ayam, bhikkhave, sammakammanto sasavo punnabhagiyo upadhivepakko.
mn117:26.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammakammanto ariyo anasavo lokuttaro maggango?
mn117:26.2: Ya kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anasavacittassa ariyamaggasamangino ariyamaggam bhavayato tihi kayaduccaritehi arati virati pativirati veramani—
mn117:26.3: ayam, bhikkhave, sammakammanto ariyo anasavo lokuttaro maggango.
mn117:27.1: So micchakammantassa pahanaya vayamati, sammakammantassa upasampadaya; svassa hoti sammavayamo.
mn117:27.2: So sato micchakammantam pajahati, sato sammakammantam upasampajja viharati; sassa hoti sammasati.
mn117:27.3: Itiyime tayo dhamma sammakammantam anuparidhavanti anuparivattanti, seyyathidam—sammaditthi, sammavayamo, sammasati.
mn117:28.3: Micchaajivam ‘micchaajivo’ti pajanati, sammaajivam ‘sammaajivo’ti pajanati; sassa hoti sammaditthi.
mn117:29.2: Kuhana, lapana, nemittikata, nippesikata, labhena labham nijigisanata—
mn117:30.3: atthi, bhikkhave, sammaajivo sasavo punnabhagiyo upadhivepakko;
mn117:30.4: atthi, bhikkhave, sammaajivo ariyo anasavo lokuttaro maggango.
mn117:31.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaajivo sasavo punnabhagiyo upadhivepakko?
mn117:31.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako micchaajivam pahaya sammaajivena jivikam kappeti—
mn117:31.3: ayam, bhikkhave, sammaajivo sasavo punnabhagiyo upadhivepakko.
mn117:32.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaajivo ariyo anasavo lokuttaro maggango?
mn117:32.2: Ya kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anasavacittassa ariyamaggasamangino ariyamaggam bhavayato micchaajiva arati virati pativirati veramani—
mn117:32.3: ayam, bhikkhave, sammaajivo ariyo anasavo lokuttaro maggango.
mn117:33.1: So micchaajivassa pahanaya vayamati, sammaajivassa upasampadaya; svassa hoti sammavayamo.
mn117:33.2: So sato micchaajivam pajahati, sato sammaajivam upasampajja viharati; sassa hoti sammasati.
mn117:33.3: Itiyime tayo dhamma sammaajivam anuparidhavanti anuparivattanti, seyyathidam—sammaditthi, sammavayamo, sammasati.
mn117:34.3: Sammaditthissa, bhikkhave, sammasankappo pahoti, sammasankappassa sammavaca pahoti, sammavacassa sammakammanto pahoti, sammakammantassa sammaajivo pahoti, sammaajivassa sammavayamo pahoti, sammavayamassa sammasati pahoti, sammasatissa sammasamadhi pahoti, sammasamadhissa sammananam pahoti, sammananassa sammavimutti pahoti.
mn117:34.4: Iti kho, bhikkhave, atthangasamannagato sekkho, dasangasamannagato araha hoti.
mn117:34.5: Tatrapi sammananena aneke papaka akusala dhamma vigata bhavanaparipurim gacchanti.
mn117:35.4: Ye ca micchaditthipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti te cassa nijjinna honti.
mn117:35.5: Sammaditthipaccaya aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti.
mn117:35.15: Ye ca micchavimuttipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti te cassa nijjinna honti.
mn117:35.16: Sammavimuttipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti.
mn117:36.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, visati kusalapakkha, visati akusalapakkha—
mn117:36.2: mahacattarisako dhammapariyayo pavattito appativattiyo samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim.
mn117:37.1: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, samano va brahmano va imam mahacattarisakam dhammapariyayam garahitabbam patikkositabbam manneyya tassa dittheva dhamme dasasahadhammika vadanuvada garayham thanam agacchanti—
mn117:37.2: sammaditthince bhavam garahati, ye ca micchaditthi samanabrahmana te bhoto pujja, te bhoto pasamsa;
mn117:37.3: sammasankappance bhavam garahati, ye ca micchasankappa samanabrahmana te bhoto pujja, te bhoto pasamsa;
mn117:37.11: sammavimuttince bhavam garahati, ye ca micchavimutti samanabrahmana te bhoto pujja, te bhoto pasamsa.
mn117:37.12: Yo koci, bhikkhave, samano va brahmano va imam mahacattarisakam dhammapariyayam garahitabbam patikkositabbam manneyya tassa dittheva dhamme ime dasasahadhammika vadanuvada garayham thanam agacchanti.
mn117:38.1: Yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesum okkala vassabhanna ahetuvada akiriyavada natthikavada tepi mahacattarisakam dhammapariyayam na garahitabbam nappatikkositabbam amannimsu.
mn117:38.5: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
